summary: The 'Creating Hope and Opportunity for Individuals and Communities through Education Act' (CHOICE Act) focuses on expanding educational opportunities. It amends the Scholarships for Opportunity and Results Act to improve scholarships for low-income students in Washington D.C. It also introduces 'Education portability for individuals with disabilities', allowing states to provide funding for students with disabilities to attend private schools. Finally, it establishes a pilot program for military families, offering scholarships for children on military installations to attend the schools of their choice.
